articles.description: Dr Hans Kluge, regional director for Europe at the World Health Organization, warned death rates from cancer will surge in the coming years because of delays to scans and treatment in the pandemic.
articles.content:
Covid has had a 'catastrophic' impact on cancer treatments and 'a crisis is brewing', the World Health Organization has warned.
Millions of people across Europe saw their scans or treatment delayed … [+7223 chars]
